stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Emails with Various Email Subjects Contain Malicious Links
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
On 17 September 2014, malicious emails were sent from many senders with various subject lines to 239 recipients of a defense industrial base (DIB) organization. The emails contained a malicious link to www.southernexhibits.com. The message displays an html page with a reference to www.bankofamerica.com.
The source tracks this activity under the name Clandestine Fox. This is related to previous activity described in IB-14-10446.

Hi Everyone!

I hope you have all had a great summer and that you are ready to work again on our New Connections program. Iâ€™ve just been in touch with Adrian at Wynyard Carres and sheâ€™s planning to host a New Connections event in early October. As soon as she has the date and program of events ready, sheâ€™ll be sending that out to us all. check here for more detail. Thanks

Sincerely,
[REDACTED]
Administrative Assistant
Mallard Diversified Services Inc.
Wadena, SK

Hello Everyone,

I am sending out to you all, our calendars for September. I know ... I am saying the exact same thing .. what already? but yes indeed the autumn season is truly upon our doorsteps. We can still hope for lots of mild warm weather though.
As usual, if you have any questions, concerns or suggestions, please don't hesitate to call us. Also if you find a typo of sorts I would appreciate a quick email back letting me know. Want more information? check here..
Thanks once again & have yourselves a wonderful September !

Kind Regards,
[REDACTED]
Executive Director
Mental Health Drop-In Centre

---- END EMAIL BODY ---- The senders included the following email addresses: tal5898@013net.net manihana@013.net soad1@netvision.net.il poltro@libero.it miz30@013.net.il meravar@smile.net.il ami-c@013.net deerpark@sasktel.net hani1872@netvision.net.il rada1@013.net

Hi Everyone!

As promised, here is the first draft of the New Connections proposal. Please make whatever changes to the document, additions, etc. and send it back to me by next Friday. I will then assemble the second draft from your suggestions and send it back out again!

Thanks so much!
[REDACTED]

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd"> <HTML><HEAD><TITLE>Loading...</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="Content-Type" Content="text/html; charset=Windows-1252"> <STYLE type="text/css"> BODY { font: 8pt/12pt verdana } H1 { font: 13pt/15pt verdana } H2 { font: 8pt/12pt verdana } A:link { color: red } A:visited { color: maroon } </STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY> <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript"> window.location.href="https://www.bankofamerica.com/privacy/overview.go"; </script>=</BODY></HTML>
The URL http://www.southernexhibits.com/privacy/ was previously used in a similar campaign described in IB-14-10446.
